Name: Late Night
Ingredients: 10 ml Lustau Oloroso Don Nuño Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of dust with freashly grated tonka bean & dried rose petals.
Review: This spirit-forward stirred cocktail combines fruity pear, dry oloroso sherry and fortifying cognac.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2015 by Claudia Agliano at 34 Restaurant in Mayfair, London, England. Claudia's original recipe specifies 52.5ml Martell XO cognac , 22.5ml poire william liqueur, 15ml oloroso sherry and 3 drops Abbotts bitters.
Nutrition: One serving of Late Night contains 134 calories
